titles.title: Recognizing the 60th anniversary of Everglades National Park.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2503-2504)

Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Transportation and Infrastructure
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.
Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 110-516, Part I.
Mr. Rahall moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 845.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

bill.summary:
3/4/2008--Passed House amended. Recognizes the 60th anniversary of Everglades National Park.
Dedicates the House of Representatives to the success of the Comprehensive Everglades Restoration Plan.
